item.title: Navodaya students from Raichur witness satellite launch at Sriharikota
item.description:
<![CDATA[Students of Navodaya Central School from Raichur witnessed a live satellite launch at the prestigious ISRO facility in Sriharikota.
A group of 45 students from Grades 8, 9 and 10, accompanied by four faculty members, attended the launch of NISAR satellite on Wednesday.
The visit marks a significant milestone in the schoolâ€™s commitment to providing real-world exposure to students in the field of space science and technology.
This unique educational journey has been made possible under the visi...]]>
